auth.subtitle: Log in or create an account to continue
auth.autoCreateAccount: If you don't have an account, we'll create one for you.
auth.termsPrefix: By continuing, you agree to our

hero.title: Fill out documents
hero.subtitle: Save your data once, use it forever. No more copy-paste, no more mistakes.

features.dataAtHand: Your data always at your fingertips

errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number

1.headline: Tired of filling out documents with the same data over and over?

3.headline: And when you make a tiny mistake?

4.headline: You don't need someone to do the work for you.
4.subtext: You need someone to help you do it better. Without losing control.

5.headline: Give yourself a chance.
5.subtext: Try it. It's easier than you think.

insert.title: How to insert data
insert.subtitle: The easiest way to fill out a document

step1.title: Click where you want to write
step1.description: Place your cursor at the point in the document where you want to add text

step2.title: Insert the data
step2.description: Type with your keyboard, or click a value from the sidebar on the right to insert it automatically

replace.title: How to replace text
replace.subtitle: If you need to modify existing text

step1.title: Select the text to change
step1.description: Click and drag with your mouse to highlight the text you want to replace

step2.title: Replace
step2.description: Type the new text, or click a value from the sidebar on the right to replace it

success.title: Document uploaded!
success.description: The file has been processed successfully

tutorial.title: How it works
tutorial.subtitle: Here's what you can do in the editor

clickAndType.title: Click and type
clickAndType.description: Click anywhere in the document and start typing, just like in Word.

insertFromSidebar.title: Insert from sidebar
insertFromSidebar.description: Place your cursor and click a value from the sidebar: it will be inserted automatically.

selectAndReplace.title: Select and replace
selectAndReplace.description: Select text and type to replace it, or click a value from the sidebar to swap it.

saveForReuse.title: Save for reuse
saveForReuse.description: Select text and add it to the sidebar with one click: you can reuse it in other documents.

note.label: Note:
note.text: In the editor you'll see a simplified view for easier editing. The downloaded document will keep its original formatting.

empty.title: Upload a document
empty.description: Drag your file here or click to select it.
empty.descriptionHint: You can edit it and download it in your preferred format.
empty.descriptionDemo: Upload a Word document and use the data on the right to fill it out quickly.
empty.descriptionDemoHint: This is a demo, nothing is saved.
empty.supportedFormats: Supported formats: DOC, DOCX, ODT, RTF, TXT

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Estos son datos de ejemplo. Pruébalos en el documento, luego añade tus datos reales.
onboarding.demoNotSaved: Los datos demo no se guardan. Añade los tuyos para usarlos en cualquier lugar.

onboardingTips.tip1: Select text in the document to replace it with a value
onboardingTips.tip2: Click on a value to insert it at the cursor position
onboardingTips.tip3: Add your real data to fill out documents in seconds
onboardingTips.tip4: Your data is securely saved in your account

status.replaceHint: Click a value to replace the text
status.insertHint: Cursor active — click a value to insert it
status.defaultHint: Select text in the document to replace it
status.saveTooltip: Save this text to your data
status.saveTooltipDemo: Add this text to demo data

banner.title: ¡Pruébalo ahora!
banner.description: Estos son datos de ejemplo. Sube un documento y haz clic en un valor para insertarlo.

cta.title: ¿Te gusta? Guarda tus datos reales
cta.description: Inicia sesión para guardar tus datos y usarlos en cualquier documento

demo.notSavedNote: Los datos demo no se guardan. Inicia sesión para conservarlos.

empty.title: Your data is empty
empty.description: Add your data to fill out documents in no time. Just enter them once.

addDialog.title: Add data
addDialog.description: Enter the value you want to reuse in documents.
addDialog.valueHint: This is the text that will be inserted in the document
addDialog.label: Label

errors.addFailed: Unable to add. Please try again.
errors.unexpected: An error occurred. Please try again.

download.title: Download document
download.description: Choose the file name and format.

auth.title: Log in to download
auth.description: Log in or create a free account to download the completed document.

credits.available: {count, plural, =1 {# credit available} other {# credits available}}

errors.insufficientCreditsRetry: Insufficient credits. Refresh the page and try again.

compare.title: Compare changes
compare.affectedPages: {count, plural, =1 {# page affected} other {# pages affected}}

highlightBanner.emphasis: Yellow highlights are only for this preview.
highlightBanner.text: The document you download will have no highlights: you'll only see the modified text, exactly like the original.
